name: Clouds of Farfisa
description:
"Clouds of Farfisa" is a jam game hallucinated from the music and cover of the mystical Utheo Choerer's 7"-record "Første gir / Stiv kuling" on the Lyskestrekk Records label Gameplay is taking inspiration from the classic Nintendo Squish Compete with others using the online highscore! Keyboard/Mobile/Gamepad supported Controls: Arrow keys + Spacebar / or Mobile-onscreen / or gamepad Check the music out at: https://www.lyskestrekk.com/
https://www.instagram.com/lyskestrekk_records Cover art by: Arash zarifian Game developed by Nilski for the #dreamarcadearchive game jam 2020 Music is used with permission by Lyskestrekk Records. All rights owned  by them
